subject: Reminder: Your OUR SEARCH Account

subject: Reminder: Your OUR SEARCH Account

subject: OUR Search: New postings this week!
body: Dear student, new projects in your major or that might match your interests have been posted this week!

subject: OUR Search: New postings this week!
body: Dear faculty, new students who might be a good fit for your research have joined the platform this week!
